snippet.title: Half-Life: 25th Anniversary Adventure - OUT NOW
snippet.description:
Play FOR FREE now!
https://hl25.lambdageneration.com/

We developed our own mini game! We really wanted to do something special for Half-Life's 25th anniversary, so we went to work on our most technically complex project to date. None of us have ever developed a game before, so we're really happy with the way it turned out! Check it out now if you want! It should only take up around 15 minutes of your time and it should work on mobile as well :)
--------------
Join the definitive home for everything Valve related:
https://community.lambdageneration.com/
--------------
TRAILER CREDITS:

Capture, Editing & VFX: Mitch "Robo" Wensveen
Music: Aaron F. Bianchi
Voice: Harry S. Robins
--------------
Subscribe for more Valve goodness.

LambdaGeneration - The Ultimate Valve Community

Website: http://lambdageneration.com/
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/lambdagen
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lambdageneration
Discord: https://discord.gg/2FcPh6j

#halflife #anniversary #indiegame
